title: Integrated Risk, Resilience, and Sustainability Management: Professional Practitioner Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational social systems and basic professional expertise in job-related fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Modular content delivery using digital devices, with applied education focused on professional practice cases.

learning_goals: They can identify at least three vulnerabilities in social systems using a risk assessment framework.
They can apply systemic resilience-strengthening strategies to real-world case studies.
They analyze the correlation between sustainability goals and risk management to establish a decision-making model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
